description: Fresh, sugar-free fruit juices make a healthier jelly. These take most of the day to set, but only minutes to make.
keywords: Jelly,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Traffic-light Jellies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put 3 leaves of gelatine in a shallow bowl and cover them with cold water. Allow them to soften for 3-5 minutes until pliable.

Heat 1 fruit juice gently over a low heat in a small saucepan. When the gelatine is soft, remove it from the water and squeeze out the excess. Take the pan off the heat. Add the gelatine, whisking to dissolve. Cool, then divide equally between 10 small 150ml plastic glasses. Chill to set.

Repeat the process with the second jelly, making sure you choose a contrasting colour to the first. Make sure the second fruit juice mixture is cold before pouring it carefully on top of the set jelly.
Repeat the process with the final fruit juice and return to the fridge to set before serving.
